info.title: Schema of Azure resource events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure resource events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

parameters.name: topicHostname
parameters.description: The host name of the topic, e.g. topic1.westus2-1.eventgrid.azure.net

post.description: Test method to generate a deserialization method.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 Bad Request.

 * 500 Internal Server Error.

 * 429 Too Many Events

 * 404 Not Found.

post.description: Test method to generate a deserialization method.

ResourceWriteSuccessData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceWriteSuccess event. This is raised when a resource create or update operation succeeds.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceWriteFailureData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceWriteFailure event. This is raised when a resource create or update operation fails.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.
